summary:
Niek is an experienced and communicative engineer with knowledge of requirements engineering, Architecting, developing and deploying Cloud native applications in various programming languages including:C#, C,C++,Typescript and Java.  His proactive approach and being able to make decisions in during high levels of uncertainty are positive traits that are mentions by others about him.

Niek graduated in july 2002 as Engineer in ComputerScience. His education was aimed at real-time embedded and distributed systems. 

Before starting his degree in ComputerSciences Niek had finished a technical degree in Electronics keywords: digital/analogue/tele- communication, developing electronic systems,hardware and software development. At that moment his interest in software development  and ambition were formed.

Niek likes to improve on current expertises but is also eager to step forward, take responsibility and also introduce new technologies that help.

In several projects Niek grew to a technical leading person helping the team forward. Niek likes to coach people and actively coaches developers and graduates. He also appreciates feedback to improve on his hard- and softskills.

Niek(born in 1979) lives in Arnhem, and is father of 2 children.

passion&interests:
-Astronomy/Space/Rocketry/Stargazing with my telescope together with my kids
-Table-tennis
-Biochemistry
-Snowboarding & skiing
-Member of technical commission of the association-of-owners(80 houseowners)
-Science
-Everything regarding software development
-Blockchain, machine learning & AI.
-VR(using my Oculus Rift & developing VR software)

profile_positions.description:
Niek got the opportunity to amplify his productivity by guiding other teams to do the right things to help VGZ perform better at implementing software architectures.
keyword:
-aligning tactical with operational
-communicator
-networking skills
-collaboration
-designing and executing software architecture for multiple teams.
-empowering teams
-cloud architecture
-full-stack
-.net 
-.angular
-platform engineering
-infrasec-devops
profile_positions.title: Software Architect

profile_positions.description:
Due to the Covid-19 uncertainties Niek decided to move on and start working at VGZ. VGZ is a non-profit organisation focused on getting the best healthcare for its customers while your healthcare affairs are arranged quickly and easily. Vgz is providing health insurance to customers for a variety of brands. 
Niek works here on cloud native .net  & Angular applications that help bring the insurance processes to a higher level and help the customer and employees have a better experience. By Azure Devops and Terraform for infrastructure-as-code the deployments are fully automated.

keywords:
- cloud archicture
-Azure
-.NET
-Angular
-infrasec-devops
-fullstack
-Agile
-Terraform
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Developer

profile_positions.description:
Niek took up the opportunity to start developing Cloud Native Applications at Luminis. It is an environment which actively promotes introduction of new technologies and have close contact with customers. Both help in creating more cost-effective solutions. 

Niek envisioned that Cloud-Native would bring a lot of benefits to customers & developers with regards of quicker time to market and more agility to embrace new technologies. At Luminis Niek was challenged to make this become a reality.

Alongside the technical aspects of this job the trait of being communicative and the abilility to connect with new people was praised as it helped to get in contact with new potential customers. 

Keywords: Cloud Architectures, Azure, ARM, CI/CD pipelines with Azure-Devops, Azure AD, Azure serverless, netcore 3.1, Angular 9
profile_positions.title: Software Developer&Architect

profile_positions.description:
Qirion is a consultancy company working for several customers including Alliander. They have tools& algoritms to optimize heat networks. Those heat networks can be used to heat houses without a natural gas connection. 

This project is about bringing this tooling to the Azure Cloud and developing the webapp to have a modern look and feel.

Keywords: Cloud Architectures, Azure, ARM, CI/CD pipelines with Azure-Devops, Azure AD, Azure serverless, netcore 3.1, C#, Typescript, Angular 9
profile_positions.title: Architecting & Developing heat networks for Qirion(Luminis Consultant)

profile_positions.description:
Architecting and active development on the next generation of embedded payment applications together with buidling applications for the digital first customer experience. Niek works as a full-stack developer/architect including devops in various team configurations(from 4 to 16). He proactively works together to lead the team forward. Niek created applications from scratch to productions while also maintenaning those applications. Niek has proven the ability to quickly adopt to changing environments and technologies.

During this time Niek played a pivotal role in the business decision to centralize customer managment to be able to screen customers. This was nescessary to abide to the EU anti-money-laundring law. the end result is an application build on a message based architecture that connects to several other applications and is used in several departments of the company. 

Keywords: TOGAF, Architecture, Domain Driven Design.Net Core, asp.net core mvc, migrations, C#, TypeScript, AngularJS, Aurelia, jspm, nodejs, gulp, systemd, Linux, sq-lite, mariadb, dbkg, security, encryption, Nuget, artifactory, docker, docker-vs2017 integration, .net, C++,Jira, Sparx Systems Enterprise Architect, Visual Studio, Microsoft Code, Gherkin, Specflow, xunit, embedded,git-flow, continuous deployment with Teamcity/Jenkins, DevOps with Ansible, payment services, business analysis, scrum/agility. Uncle Bob,Martin Fowler,refactoring, CQRS, Eventsourcing, RabbitMq.

Niek moved to this position to be able to combine his passion for software development together with his passion for his 2 children,which were born in 2012 and 2014.
profile_positions.title: Software Developer&Architect

profile_positions.description:
Niek is designer/developer in various teams. He designs and helps implement applications. Niek develops Java & .NET Software. 

Niek took the lead starting development and also getting a process in place to help out the developers to come from requirements to code.implementing the Iconix process got a more structured way of working in place.

Depending on the team seniority, Sparx Systems Enterprise Architect has been used to go completely from requirements analysis to codegeneration/roundtrip engineering. The linked sourcecode in the model is linked to the domain model,usecases and even requirements. In this way the design is always in sync with the code. this helped a project move forward when there were many junior developers onboard.

Keywords:
-Java,Spring, Hibernate, security, Ajax based webdevelopement.,Hudson,Maven, spring, Apache Tomcat,osgi, dbunit, unitils, seleniumUI testing, junit,hamcrest asserts, jmock, jmx, jms, rmi Eclipse, 
-C#,T-SQL2008, .NET4.0, Silverlight4.0, EntityFramework, Linq, MVVM, Prism, Entlib5, RIA,Unity
-UML. SOA,AOP(Aspect Oriented Programming), Agile, SCRUM, ICONIX(lean development process). 
-Functional domains: financial, billing, reporting,middleware integration platforms.

Niek moved to this position due to the long traveling distances and frequent hotel visits in his previous job at Sogeti.
profile_positions.title: Senior Sofware Developer/Architect

profile_positions.description:
Taking on different software development assignments in different working environments, project settings and acting in different positions in project teams.


Keywords: C#,C/C++,Design,planning,technical lead.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
This assignment involved redesigning and developing the ticket vending machine software of the NS to make it ready for supporting product assortments other than NS only. At this moment this software runs public on the machines successfully. 

The software runs in separated components working together to order,pay and deliver train tickets via corba.

Niek grew from senior developer to the technical leading person and focused on getting the architecture right.

Software Design: UML with Enterprise Architect 6.5, round-trip engineering,corba,soa
Developing: VC++ 6.0 VisualAssist,Devpartner
ConfigurationManagement: CruiseControl,Ant
keywords: C++,UML,requirements,Corba,IPC,scripting,DesignPatterns.
profile_positions.title: Lead Software Developer/Architect(Sogeti consultant)

profile_positions.description:
Assignment in developing a streaming IPTV scrambler service. In a projectteam of 10 people. keywords:UML, AES/CSA/RCBC/CTS algorithms, C++/Linux Redhat, C#.NET,Visual Studio.NET 2005, IPC, tcp/ip, udp/ip, xslt, xml, DVB, MPEG2, MPEG4.

the endresult was a working content scrambler for videocontent in DVB format(based on MPEG2).
profile_positions.title: Embedded Software Engineer(Sogeti consultant)

profile_positions.description:
Niek was positioned as a testautomation developer and started implementation of a automated testframewrok. After a few months the project was cancelled and the team send home, but due to the performance of Niek he was moved to the development group. Here Niek worked within a team developing the nextgen Phlips mediaplayer that conforms to the OpenMax standard. The development was done  in ansi-C.
Also during this time Niek has worked on a testharness usedto test a product from Philips Semiconductors 
keyword: TMAP,TEMB, C/C++, Trimedia, ARM, OpenMax, TSSA4, CTE, CMSynergy, ChangeSynergy.
profile_positions.title: Embedded Software Engineer(Sogeti consultant)
